summary: Defines a Prefect commandâ€‘line interface for managing work pools, offering commands to create, delete, list, update, pause, resume, set or clear concurrency limits, provision infrastructure, preview configurations, and retrieve default job templates, while handling API interactions and user prompts.
business_intent: Enable Prefect users to configure, control, and provision execution environments for their workflows directly from the terminal, streamlining operational management of work pools and associated infrastructure.
